description: Script to test the correct flip for a data set when using 1dDW_Grad_o_Mat++.

grad_col_matA.title: Column-Wise Matrix A
grad_col_matA.description: Set of column-wise g- or b-matrix elements ("AFNI"-style format, "diagonal-first")

grad_col_matT.title: Column-Wise Matrix T
grad_col_matT.description: Set of column-wise g- or b-matrix elements ("TORTOISE"-style format, "row-first")

mask.title: Mask
mask.description: Optional mask (probably whole brain); otherwise, automasking is performed

bvals.title: Bvals
bvals.description: Can input bvals, if necessary (but shouldn't be necessary?)

thresh_fa.title: FA Threshold
thresh_fa.description: Set minimum FA value for tracking (default X=0.2)

thresh_len.title: Tract Length Threshold
thresh_len.description: Set minimum tract length to keep a tract when propagating (default L=30mm)

prefix.title: Prefix
prefix.description: Output name of text file that stores recommended flip option

check_abs_min.title: Check Absolute Minimum
check_abs_min.description: Handle tiny negative values in gradient vectors

scale_out_1000.title: Scale Output to 1000 Flag
scale_out_1000.description: Scale output to 1000, as in 3dDWItoDT (probably not necessary)

wdir.title: Working Directory
wdir.description: Rename working directory output; useful if running multiple iterations
